title: Draft 125 redeploy (no code changes) documentation updates

requirements.summary: Support a Draft 125 clean redeploy by documenting the redeploy record and smoke verification without changing application source code.
acceptanceCriteria: A new draft is created and deployed successfully.
Deployment uses the same code as Version 125 (no source code edits).
No backend migration is executed/required as part of this redeploy.
The deployed app loads and is usable (basic smoke verification: app loads, Internet Identity login works, dashboard renders after profile is available).

file_operations.description: After the redeploy completes, fill in the redeploy record fields for Draft Version 125 (date/time, network, canister IDs, URL, steps executed, and outcomes) and explicitly confirm no functional/UI/schema/state changes and no migrations.

After the redeploy completes, record the smoke-check execution results for Draft 125 (app loads, Internet Identity login works, dashboard renders after profile is available) and paste any console errors if present.

requirements.summary: Create Draft 125 redeploy documentation files from the existing template patterns, explicitly stating there were no functional/UI/schema/state changes.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md exists and follows the structure/pattern of prior REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_*.md files, referencing Draft Version 125 and 'Code Changes: None'.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md exists and follows the pattern of prior REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_*.md files for Draft 125.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md exists and follows the pattern of prior SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_*.md files for Draft 125.

file_operations.description: Create a Draft Version 125 clean rebuild/redeploy doc matching the structure of prior REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_*.md files, explicitly stating: Migration Required: No; Code Changes: None; no functional/UI/schema/state changes.

Create a Draft Version 125 redeploy note file following the pattern of prior REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_*.md files, including placeholders for date/time, network, canister IDs/URL, steps executed, and a clear statement that there were no functional/UI/schema/state changes.

Create a Draft Version 125 smoke check checklist following the pattern of prior SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_*.md files, covering app load, Internet Identity login, and dashboard render after profile availability, with spaces to record results and errors.
